oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1859 correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: correspondence; 1850s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ??, Memphis, to Doct. Geo. Wood. I have arranged for your deposition to be taken concerning a debt.
